title: Support Team on the Support Tickets dont help
body:
Waited 7 days for a response and had no response, so I made a new ticket with all this detail, could someone just be able to help me on here and then help me on the ticket service?

Basically, I was playing on my account from last season to the start of this season, until I went away on holiday, so I basically gave my account to one of my friends and that he said he wouldn't do any harm towards it at all, and that, say 2-3 months later, I receive a text saying, "sorry but I took your account and if u want it back, come on discord", and I came back on discord today, and that he gave me my account back to me, and that he said "oh yeah its got a 14 day ban for toxicity" so I basically flipped with him, and that he said sorry and everything, and I was wondering if I could be able to play on my account again, since I'm the one whos down all the hard work, and my friend just ruins it by getting it banned



Basically, when I gave him my account. he stole it off me after, I basically changed the password, and he still had my email address, and that when I came back off my holidays he had basically stolen my account, and told me to add him on his new name, and that I feel shocked that he did that, and that when I read through the rules after he did that, I was like oh damn, and then I tried to get my account back through my email, which I did, because I had TID, and that I got on my account and its banned for 14 days, which end on the 9th, but I feel like I've been scammed from playing the game which I grind every single day of my life, and that I don't want to grind smurfs., and I want my main account back for good


I have my account back after my Security team had to go through all my emails, accounts and networks to try and find it, and I finally get it back and I'm banned for 14 days off someone who was my friend and is now a foe, could you please help me

replies.body: It's reasons like this that we don't share account sharing of any kind, and as much as you trust someone it can still result in a bad ending.  Still, I'm sorry to hear about the situation you're going through, and the ticketing system is the best way to get this resolved.  Now that you have your account, you can reply back and dispute the ban with the player behavior team.  If you do, I still want you to consider the negative experiences this ended up causing for other players.  Get back to the specialist in your ticket or create a new one if it's closed, and please don't share your account again.

I understand buddy, but heres the thing, my team worked 4 weeks into my case and got my account back for me, and as soon as I logged onto it, it was banned for another 7 days after he had gotten it banned 7 days ago, for a 14 day ban, I didn't trust him with it, he changed the details of the account as soon as he got it, that's the thing. I didn't want him to have my account, I was seeing if he was going to be a good guy
